transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good day sir.
Customer: Haan, good morning sir, Mayank baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan Mayank boliye.
Customer: Haanji sir.
Customer: Aapko maine do teen cheeze batayi thi woh toh kuch bhi nahi hui hai aur abhi woh leads ka bhi issue chal raha hai usko mere father kab se baat kar rahe hai aapse uske liye koi call back nahi mail par revert aata hai toh mail pe kuch bhi unka official revert nahi uska kya karne wale ho?
Executive: Sir mail pe sir already aapke father ko already 30 lakh pehle hi kar diya gaya hai ki kya naam hai jo by leads hai aapki woh hum matlab yearly leads hai na woh already usme aapki five consume ho chuke hai five bache hai ab hum usko renew us pe nahi karwa sakte sir.
Customer: Ek minute woh chhod do abhi topic pehle maine aapko bola tha ki mere ko woh karke de do woh sab photos wagera sahi se kar do jo shekhar set hai uska photo pehle laga do woh bhi nahi hua abhi sir.
Executive: Woh toh kar diya hai sir maine.
Customer: Nahi bilkul nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Dekhiye sir aap ek baar ek baar ya refresh kijiye dobara log out karke login kijiye woh maine kar diya hai sir abhi.
Customer: Arre bhaiya nahi kiya hai sab mere ko images waise hi dikh rahe hai abhi bhi.
Executive: Waise sir ya toh fir main abhi na actually main meeting pe baitha hua hu main aapko abhi 5-10 minute mein call back karu sir se.
Customer: Bas 5 minute dijiye main 5 minute mein abhi dekh lo na aap abhi abhi dekho na.
Executive: Sir actually mere paas laptop nahi hai na main meeting mein baitha hua hu yaha pe.
Customer: Bhaiya hamare paas PC nahi hota hai mere paas PC haath mein rehta toh main hi kar leta.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir main bol raha hu ki kar do kar do kar do bolke.
Customer: Sir aap wahi cheez keh rahe ho.
Executive: Sir main already keh chuka hu main aapko wahi cheez keh raha hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi arre bhaiya main aap check kar lo main chahiye toh aapko screenshot bhej abhi screenshot nikal ke rakhta hu main.
Executive: Sir sir haan haan main woh cheeze theek hai sir aap screenshot leke rakh lijiye koi nahi but main yeh keh raha hu ki mere paas abhi main.
Customer: Teen char starting ke sirf teen char kiye hue hai baki sab waise ke waise hai bhaiya.
Executive: Main wahi keh raha hu main abhi system pe bhi available nahi hu sir ki main woh rahi baat aapki by leads uske regarding kal se mera pura discussion ho gaya tha aapke product ke liye main abhi photos dobara ek baar usme check karke aapko usme update kara dunga uske liye aap nishchint rahiye photos aapki update ho jayenge usme.
Customer: Haan yeh cheez ho gayi aur by leads ka aapne bata diya par woh toh reason nahi hua na bhaiya hamare ko toh bilkul kisi ne nahi bataya aapne bataya kya aap hi bataiye.
Executive: Sir main aapko ek baat batata hu aap maan lijiye abhi mere sir se baat hui thi us time pe maine sir ko yeh kaha tha ki matlab jo us time pe video video meet pe aap the 50 minute ya ek ghanta hamari video meet chali thi maine aapko already tab main bata deta ki sir aapko daily basis pe ek by lead milegi aur weekly aapko saat milegi abhi jo aapko mil rahi hai daily bonus wali aap consume kijiye right sir but agar aap yeh khud hi dhyan lagaiye agar aapko matlab jo sales person aaye the agar unhone aapko bataya tha ki aapko yearly 10 leads denge hum aapko yearly matlab.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi kisi ne nahi bataya yeh cheez aap sohel ko call karke puch lijiye uske baad sushar ko call karke puch lijiye ki usne bataya kya kisi ne nahi bataya yeh cheez.
Executive: Woh cheez woh cheez ke liye main agree karta hu woh uss cheez ke liye main sohel se baat karunga.
Customer: Toh khatam ho gaya agree usi pe toh karwa rahe hai hum aapko agree karna hi padega.
Executive: Sir ek baat samjhiye suniye suniye aap do chahe na karo yeh cheez sab agree kar rahe ho na ki aapne nahi bataya kisi ne.
Customer: Sir aur na hi yeh cheez kahi mentioned hai na yeh cheez kahi mentioned hai ki alag se 10 lead mil rahi hai bonus mein.
Executive: Sir ek baar aap apna jo agar laptop se color panel jo sir ne open kiya tha na usme uska jo settings se ek aapka uska aata hai fast transaction ka usme jaake dekhiye toh aapko weekly kitni leads mil rahi hai yearly kitni mili hai woh sari aa jati hai ab meri baat sun lijiye main kya kehna chahta hu abhi abhi jaise sir sohel ji ne aapko nahi bataya ki yearly leads milegi agar main bhi nahi batata toh jahir si baat hai aapko yeh baat nahi pata chalti ki aapko but yeh cheez yaha pe point yeh hai ki agar aapne leads consume kari hai hai na toh woh lead toh aapne hi consume kari hai na sir aisa toh hai nahi ki woh humne paanch lead ya toh hata di aapke usse lead aapne consume kari hai uski cheez dekhiye na aapne woh consume kari hai abhi aapke paas aur leads bachi hai usme waise bhi.
Customer: Nahi sir.
Executive: Haan agar yeh hota main main dekhiye sir main pata hai uss cheez pe aapka case escalate kar deta maine waise already escalate kara tha but team se yahi revert aaya ki agar aapko 10 lead mile aapki paanch lead bina baat ke matlab hat jati hai minus ho jati hai na aapne consume kari na kuch kari toh main iss cheez ke liye team se baat kar leta but abhi sir woh dekhiye.
Customer: Isko ek toh mere papa ko samjhaiye starting mein humne leads kaise liye dekh lo aap hi jo leads aayi hai na starting mein woh kaise leads aayi hai wohi dekh lo aap woh hame pata bhi nahi tha maine mere papa ko bola ki kyu liya bolke aapne puch ke liya kya woh bol rahe ki haan maine puch ke liya toh aap yeh cheez aap unhone pucha aapko call kiya tha right starting mein jab leads woh le le rahe the main nahi tha idhar available toh aapko call kiya tha unhone.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Haan kiya tha na.
Executive: Haan kis cheez ke liye sir sir dekhiye.
Customer: Leads jo hai use kar lu nahi nahi nahi nahi suno suno suno suno pehle.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Main jo leads aayi hai usme se mere ko ek do pasand aa rahi hai aisa kuch call kiya hoga mere father ne ki main use kar raha hu ya kar lu kya main.
Executive: Haan toh maine bola hi tha unko ki sir aapke haan mere sath call aayi thi maine bola tha sir aap abhi lead consume nahi kar sakte aapke paas jo hai daily bonus milega aap woh consume kijiye yeh aap ek baar sir se bhi confirm kar lijiye maine unko yahi kaha tha ki sir abhi aap jo daily bonus hai usko consume kijiye yeh cheez maine sir ko kahi thi ki sir aapko monday ko milengi 10 ki lead tab aap ek do teen lead ek sath consume kar lijiyega abhi daily basis pe ek lead consume kar lijiye.
Customer: Theek hai sir yeh ho gaya chalo aur tenders ka bhi kuch nahi bataya.
Executive: Tenders ka haan tenders sir dekhiye usme tenders ka option aata hai direct aap jaake waha se jaise by lead consume karte hai toh by lead consume karne ke baad aapka jo bhi matlab ek by lead kam ho jati hai aise aap tender consume karenge tenders ki details aapke paas aa jati hai usme.
Customer: Theek hai fir woh tenders bhi aap usko consume kar sakte hai.
Customer: Haan aa jati hai yeh baat mujhe bhi pata hai maine galti se click kar diya tha woh toh waste hi chali gayi hum hum thodi tender ka kaam karte hai.
Executive: Nahi toh sir agar aap kaam nahi karte toh tender ignore kar dijiye aapko tender ignore toh hum kar dete hai par maine maine fir check kiya ki kuch hai kya usme kuch quantity wagera sahi dikh rahi thi toh maine fir check karne ke liye galti se click ho gaya hai woh.
Customer: Haan toh sir ek toh waste hi ho gayi na.
Executive: Sir ek hi sir aap yeh dhyan rakhiye na ek hum aapko daily bonus de rahe hai weekly aapko 10 by leads mil rahi hai 17 aapko yeh sab.
Customer: Usme se nahi hua hai woh jo aap paanch gayi hai na paanch gaya na woh jo pichle hafte jo hua tha usme se gaya hai woh.
Executive: Aapne kab kari hai consume tender kab consume kara aapne?
Customer: Ab aap dekh lo abhi 20 tarikh ko kiya shayad woh.
Executive: 20 tarikh ko kiya hai ek minute sir.
Customer: Dikhta hai na dashboard par aata hai kab kiya hai consume.
Executive: No sir tender ka actually alag rehta hai na kyuki hamare paas sari jo hamare paas government.
Customer: Bhaiya alag rehta hai sab baat sahi hai aapki par hame toh bilkul koi koi idea tak nahi diya ki tender consume aap karoge toh aapke paas tender certificate wagera woh sab hota hai unka woh sab hona chahiye tab jaake woh toh sab hame bhi pata hai thodi bahut cheeze.
Executive: Toh tender ka socha ki hum unko kuch provide kar sakte hai jiska bhi tender hoga koi le liya hoga tender government ka kya tender kisi ne liya hoga toh hum unko provide kara sakte hai yeh toh pura tender hi download karke de diya tha.
Executive: Accha sir dekhiye woh main aapse baat samajh gaya dekhiye tender ka main nahi woh keh sakte kyuki tender dekhiye tender ka aapko hame usme details fill karke aapko dalni hi padti hai haan agar aapne woh consume.
Customer: 22 November ko kiya hai.
Executive: Sir main aapki baat samajh gaya but sir dekhiye agar jo aapki by leads paanch consume hui hai na main unke liye sab jaake aage main agar yeh nahi hai toh main abhi jaise hi apne seat pe jaata hu main ek baar senior se bhi aapka discussion kara dunga uske regarding toh aap fir unse bhi baat kar lijiyega jo aapka tender ka concern hai aur leads wala hai na woh already main team ko share kar chuka hu uske liye.
Customer: Kis se baat karu?
Executive: Main sir abhi main meeting mein baitha hu bas meeting aadhe ghante mein khatam hone wali hai 10-15 minute mein main 10-15 minute mein aapko bas call back kar raha hu 5 minute mein.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai woh uska issue nahi hai.
Executive: Haan main abhi 5 minute mein aapko call back kar raha hu theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai. Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states pending tasks not completed.

- Issue with buyleads, no official revert.

- Shekhar Set's photo not updated.

- States not informed about byleads details.

- States 5 byleads were deducted.

- Leads in starting were not good.

- No idea about tender consumption process.



Resolution:

- Executive states Shekhar Set's photo is updated.

- Executive will check photos and update.

- Executive said daily bonus leads to be consumed.

- Executive will discuss with senior about byleads.

- Executive shared leads and tender concern with team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 5 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, photos, tenders, subscription
